content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(1.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at position(1.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter at position(1.5, -57.5)

### Smelting Complex at position(1.0, 1.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions(1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Burner inserters at positions(1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chests at positions(1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), and (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserter at position(5.5, 2.5)

### Secondary Smelting Complex at position(2.0, 7.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions(2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Burner inserters at positions(2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Wooden chests at positions(2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserter for transfer at position(3.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at position(14.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(14.5, 12.5)
- Output handling with burner inserters at positions(12.5, 14.5) and (16.5, 14.5)
- Storage chests at positions(11.5, 14.5) and (17.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(21.5, 15.5)
- Input/output system with burner inserters at positions(19.5, 15.5) and (23.5, 15.5)
- Output chest at position(24.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Multiple offshore pumps at positions(-5.5, 26.5), (2.5, 34.5), and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at position(18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at position(29.5, 51.5)
- Complex pipe network connecting components across multiple fluid systems
- Electricity distribution network (ID: 32417)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities, including:
- Mining to smelting transport
- Smelting to assembly transport
- Inter-facility material movement
- Multiple chest-based buffer storage points

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing crafting prerequisites
- Ensure all required intermediate items are available before attempting to craft complex items
- Set up proper production chains for basic materials (like iron plates) before attempting to craft items that require them

### Errors related to item placement
- Verify inventory contains required items before attempting placement
- Check recipe requirements and ensure all components are available before starting construction

### Power system issues
- Ensure proper connection of power components
- Verify fluid connections between offshore pumps, boilers, and steam engines
- Set up complete power infrastructure before attempting to power electrical machines

### Production line errors
- Ensure assembling machines have proper power connections
- Verify all required input materials are available and can be supplied to machines
- Set up proper input/output logistics for automated production
